versions.name: Initial version
versions.summary: Nintendo Switch is a hybrid console/tablet. The tablet becomes a console via a docking station connected to a tv set. Nintendo regards the concept as mainly a home gaming system rather than portable. The Switch features two wireless controllers, which may be used individually or attached to a grip to get a more traditional controller.
versions.storage: 32 GB NAND flash, expandable via microSD cards
versions.sound: 5.1 channel Linear PCM (HDMI), analog stereo (3.5mm headphone jack)
versions.media: Nintendo Switch Game Card, microSD Card
versions.connectivity: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.0 (TV Mode Only), 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB-C, HDMI
versions.resolutions: 1280x720 on integrated screen, up to 1920x1080 through HDMI
versions.output: HDMI, 3.5mm headphone jack, DisplayPort over USB-C (internal)
